Ticker Plant
============

Origins
-------

https://t.me/alkotrading

Launch
------

```
$ brew install erlang
$ git clone git://github.com/spawnproc/ticker && cd ticker
$ ./mad dep com pla && ./mad rep
```

Commands
--------

```
> book:print().
```
